Description: PRS CU24 ARTIST (better than 10-Top) Electric Guitar 2005 Paul Reed Smith / Custom 24Scarlet Red finish with Wide Thin Neck CarveExtremely Nice / Colorful Birds inlay HFS / VB Pickups and original artist hard shell case Guitar is in excellent / near mint condition! This guitar is REALLY nice... You know how some people say "Plays like butter..." and well, later you don't share the same sentiment? This Guitar has a silky, effortless feel... smooth frets and rich fingerboard (and you won't feel any sticky butter...) this guitar is amazing and plays extremely NICE!!! 2005 Custom 24Figured artist grade maple topMahogany neck with a wide/thin carve East Indian rosewood fretboardScarlet Red finishHFS treble and Vintage bass pickups with gold pole pieces. 2005 PRS Custom 24 with gold hardware. This has the artist package, so- rosewood fingerboard and head stock overlay. Paua shell bird inlays and logo. It has HFS & Vintage Bass pickups in it. Original black PRS speed knobs... Wide Thin neck carve. Beautiful flamed artist grade top, certainly more than 10 top quality. 2005 / 20th Anniversary Truss rod cover.... The original Artist Leather case with padded handle has personalized initials "RH" decal on the outside... I can swap with a regular black PRS tolex case (shown in the pics) if you prefer without any markings... just let me know..... your choice... Ask any questions... thanks !
Title: PRS Custom 24 Artist Package Gold Trem 10+ Flame Top Paul Reed Smith BIRDS OHSC
ConditionDescription: Excellent condition! Wow! Artist Grade top, gorgeous colorful inlay and plays like a dream !!!  No dings, dents or scratches... no surprises...
